summary: A processor that initially fetches twice the requested amount of intent data, then retrieves personal identifiable information (PII) at the requested rate, repeatedly requesting additional PII until the desired quantity is satisfied, while handling low hit‑rate scenarios and fallback validation.
business_intent: To maximize the completeness of PII enrichment by over‑pulling intent records and iteratively supplementing them, ensuring data pipelines meet fill targets even when initial hit rates are low.
